resources.string: confirm delete all card and image information?

Usage: After the module is enabled (the text changes to Hello XPosed), check the recommended system framework and Xiaomi smart card scope, restart the phone, open the application, and then open the card package in the settings. When you see the image that needs to be replaced, go back to the application dropdown to refresh. After the target image appears, click on the image to the right of the arrow, enter the file name of the image to be replaced, open the file manager (such as mt file manager), and grant root permission, Copy the image to be replaced to /data/data/com.zhizi42.diymiuicard/files/images/ and /data/data/com.miui.tsmclient/files/images/(And modify the permissions to be readable by anyone), and reopen the card package. At this point, the image should have changed.
Don\'t filter small cards and logos now
Now filter the small cards and logos
DIY MIUI Card v1.0,code by zhizi42(AI丿质子)
